The inscription claims this can harmlessly dissuade any domesticated cat from loitering in your residence. Purchase price includes immediate installation in your home.

<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a high-health thumper turret that damages nearby foes. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.
Poison you inflict has increased damage and duration. Other Deadly Arts traits apply additional stacks of poison.
